name: Mac & Cheese
description: Everyone needs a go-to Mac and Cheese recipe in their back pocket. Simple to makeâ€”can be done in the same time as it takes the pasta to cook. No weird ingredients and kid approved (perfect for playdates and crazy busy nights).
preparation:
1. Cook pasta according to package directions in Multipurpose Pot. Drain and return to pot.
  2. Stir in milk, seasoning and butter, if desired. Stir to coat.
tips:
Mac attack! It's simple to customize mac & cheese your way:

Mexi Mac: Stir in prepared  Poco Picante Salsa and Guacamole. 

Cha Cha Chili Mac: Stir in prepared Cha Cha Chili.

Italian Mac: Stir in 1 cup prepared Marinara Sauce, baby spinach, and artichoke hearts. 

Spicy Mac: Stir in 1 tbsp Chipotle Aioli Mix.

Chicken & Peas Mac: Stir in leftover chicken and frozen green peas.
